<!-- <![endif]-->
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
COVID
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/02/19/vaccine-rollouts-power-uneven-reopening-campaigns-across-world?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
Re-Open Sesame
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<!--[if mso]>
<img alt="A lightbulb that looks like the earth flickering on and off" style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" height=447 src="https://media.giphy.com/media/PjZyazNsp8BC4dfoqC/giphy.gif">
<![endif]-->
<!--[if !mso]>--><!-- -->
<img class="story-header-image" alt="A lightbulb that looks like the earth flickering on and off" style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" src="https://media.giphy.com/media/PjZyazNsp8BC4dfoqC/giphy.gif">
<!--<![endif]-->
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em>Giphy</em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">When the pandemic hit last winter and countries began shutting down their economies, the No. 1 question became: When will things go back to normal? </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">An entire year has passed. Much chess was played. But armed with multiple effective vaccines, countries are starting to think about reopening offices, school systems, and retail stores...for good. </p>
<h2 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0">Israel is furthest along</h2>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Powered by the fastest vaccination campaign in the world, Israel’s cabinet <a href="https://www.nytimes.com/2021/02/18/world/middleeast/israel-covid-vaccine-reopen.html?action=click&module=Top%20Stories&pgtype=Homepage&utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">voted</a> this week to open shopping malls and museums to the public. Gyms, sporting events, hotels, and swimming pools can also reopen...but only for those with a “green badge.”</p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>A green badge is a QR code that citizens can present to show they’ve been vaccinated or recovered from Covid-19. The badge gives them access to restaurants, events, and other leisure activities.</span></li>
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>The government has stopped short of making vaccines mandatory, but hopes the green badge system incentivizes holdouts to join the 2.6+ million Israelis who have already received two doses. </span></li>
</ul>
<h2 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0">The UK wants to be next</h2>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">With his country trailing only Israel, Seychelles, and the UAE in per capita vaccination rate, Prime Minister Boris Johnson will <a href="https://www.reuters.com/article/us-health-coronavirus-britain/boris-johnson-charting-path-to-re-open-uk-economy-within-months-idUSKBN2AH0OH?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">lay out</a> his “cautious” but “irreversible” approach on Monday to Brexit the UK out of lockdown. Early reports from news outlets point to a two-tiered reopening campaign. </p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>
</span><span><strong style="color:#000">Tier 1:</strong></span><span> Schools will resume on March 8 and outdoor leisure activities like parks, zoos, golf, and tennis may reopen in April. </span>
</li>
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>
</span><span><strong style="color:#000">Tier 2:</strong></span><span> The UK’s pubs and restaurants will probably have to wait until May or early June for a full reopening.</span>
</li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Reminder: </strong>The UK suffered its <a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/02/12/uk-suffers-biggest-economic-drop-300-years?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">biggest economic drop</a> in 300+ years in 2020.</p>
<h2 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0">The US is a little all over the place</h2>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">NYC upped indoor dining capacity to 35% starting next week and California lawmakers have proposed a $6.6 billion plan to reopen elementary schools by April. But health officials warn that some plans, especially <a href="https://www.npr.org/2021/02/19/969467560/if-schools-follow-cdc-guidance-bidens-reopening-goals-could-be-hard-to-reach?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">President Biden’s goal</a> of reopening most schools by his 100th day in office, are at odds with CDC guidelines.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Bottom line: </strong>Unlike when US states and many countries loosened restrictions last summer, we’re about to see what reopenings look like when a large (and increasing) chunk of the population has developed immunity from the coronavirus.</p>

<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
COVID
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/02/19/covid-vaccine-tracker?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
Vaccine Tracker
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>

</table>
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/02/19/covid-vaccine-tracker" style="text-decoration:none;border:none;" target="_blank" class="">
<img alt="Chart showing daily Covid-19 doses administered " style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" class="story-header-image" src="https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiJ1cGxvYWRzL21lZGl1bS9hc3NldC80MTE5L2RhaWx5X2NvdmlkLTE5X2Rvc2VzX2FkbWluaXN0ZXJlZC5wbmciLCJidWNrZXQiOiJvc2xvLXByb2R1Y3Rpb24iLCJlZGl0cyI6eyJyZXNpemUiOnsid2lkdGgiOjEwMDAsImhlaWdodCI6bnVsbH19fQ==">
</a>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em>Centers for Disease Control and Prevention</em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">In the US...</strong></p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>59.1 million doses, or 17.8 for every 100 people, have been administered, according to the </span><span><a href="https://www.bloomberg.com/graphics/covid-vaccine-tracker-global-distribution/?sref=KkPzpZvz&utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">Bloomberg vaccine tracker</a></span><span>.</span>
</li>
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>1.58 million doses per day were administered last week, on average.</span></li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Around the world...</strong></p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>193 million doses</span><span><strong style="color:#000"> </strong></span><span>have been administered in 87 different countries.</span>
</li>
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>6.47 million doses are being administered daily, on average.</span></li>
</ul>
<h2 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0">The latest updates</h2>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Helping hand:</strong> Political leaders in the G-7 <a href="https://www.pbs.org/newshour/world/g-7-vows-equitable-world-vaccine-access-but-details-are-scant?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">pledged</a> to use their surplus vaccine stores to help immunize developing nations...but stopped short of saying how many doses they’d provide. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">One dose to rule them all:</strong> A peer-reviewed study conducted in Israel found that Pfizer’s vaccine is at least <a href="https://www.wsj.com/articles/single-dose-of-pfizer-vaccine-is-85-effective-israeli-study-shows-11613723218?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">85% effective</a> after the first of two doses. The same study also showed that the vaccine can be stored at normal freezer temperatures instead of the current recommendation of -60 to -80 degrees Celsius. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Speaking of cold: </strong>The winter storms hitting Texas <a href="https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2021-02-19/texas-blackouts-lead-to-a-record-vaccination-drop-for-the-u-s?srnd=premium&sref=KkPzpZvz&utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">cooled off</a> its vaccination campaign. On Thursday, the state administered 118,417 fewer doses than the Thursday prior, and the seven-day moving average fell 31% compared to last week. </p>

MEDIA
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/02/19/roku-breaks-records-q4-earnings-report?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
Roku Goes Super Saiyan in Q4
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>

<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding-right:15px;padding-bottom:15px;padding-left:15px;padding-top:0px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Shares in the streaming company Roku are nearing record-highs after revealing two <a href="https://www.wsj.com/articles/rokus-revenue-surges-58-on-pandemic-fueled-streaming-boom-11613694667?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">major milestones</a> in Q4 2020:</p>
<ol>
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Surpassed 50 million active accounts</span></li>
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Raked in record revenue of $650 million, up 58% from 2019</span></li>
</ol>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">In his Thursday evening earnings call, CEO Anthony Wood gave credit where Covid’s due: “We think that the pandemic has accelerated and permanently changed the curve on the shift to streaming.” As people filled their 2020 voids with CW dramas, Roku’s users streamed 10% more per day in the fourth quarter of 2020 than they did in Q4 2019. </p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>In total, users streamed </span><span><em>17 billion hours </em></span><span>of TV in the final three months of last year, averaging 3.8 hours per day. </span>
</li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Looking ahead...</strong>Roku recently bought Quibi’s content library of 75 shows after muttering, “it’s little, and broken, but still good.” It’s now on the lookout for more content to acquire, or <a href="https://variety.com/2021/digital/news/roku-original-tv-shows-movies-quibi-1234908689/?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">even create</a> some original programming of its own.</p>

<td style="padding-right:15px;padding-bottom:15px;padding-left:15px;padding-top:0px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Your daily dose of 1 eye-popping quote, 1 crunchy stat, and 1 informative read from yesterday's business news. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Quote: </strong>"I must admit to being entertained by Mr. Kitty”—Former SEC Chair Jay Clayton <a href="https://markets.businessinsider.com/news/stocks/gamestop-trading-hearing-sec-clayton-pump-dump-roaring-kitty-transparency-2021-2-1030102595?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">reflected</a> on the performance of Reddit trader Keith “Roaring Kitty” Gill during the GameStop hearing Thursday. Clayton told CNBC that the trading action wasn’t a “pump and dump scheme.” </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Stat: </strong>Americans lost <a href="https://www.zdnet.com/article/losses-to-romance-scams-reached-a-record-304-million-in-2020/?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">$304 million</a> to romance scams last year, a record high and about a 50% increase from 2019. The Federal Trade Commission said that’s likely a result of everyone spending far more time in their houses looking for love instead of meeting people in person. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Read: </strong>Every superhero movie is a policy failure. (<a href="https://jakebittle.substack.com/p/every-superhero-movie-is-a-policy?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">Hawks and Handsaws</a>)</p>

<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
WEATHER
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/02/19/snowing-hawaii?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
So About Hawaii...
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/02/19/snowing-hawaii" style="text-decoration:none;border:none;" target="_blank" class="">
<img alt="Hawaii volcanoes with snow" style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" class="story-header-image" src="https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiJ1cGxvYWRzL21lZGl1bS9hc3NldC80MTE4L2hhd2FpaV92b2xjYW5vZXMuanBnIiwiYnVja2V0Ijoib3Nsby1wcm9kdWN0aW9uIiwiZWRpdHMiOnsicmVzaXplIjp7IndpZHRoIjoxMDAwLCJoZWlnaHQiOm51bGx9fX0=">
</a>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em>Joshua Stevens/NASA Earth Observatory</em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Yesterday, we wrote that—even though snow is covering more than 70% of the continental US—we doubted there was any powder on the ground in Hawaii. To our readers who emailed us that we were wrong, we’re about to tell you the three greatest words in the English language: <span style="text-decoration: line-through;">Breakfast for dinner</span> You were right.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">The above satellite image shows the <a href="https://www.livescience.com/hawaii-snow-stellite-images.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">snow-capped volcano peaks</a> of the Big Island’s Mauna Kea and Mauna Loa, which get a light dusting every year. Maui’s Haleakalā volcano also received a rare flurry in early February. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">+ Of course they have: </strong>Some locals have swapped their surfboards to snowboards to shred what they’re calling “<a href="https://twitter.com/theWeatherboy/status/1355102865967042562?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw%7Ctwcamp%5Etweetembed%7Ctwterm%5E1355102865967042562%7Ctwgr%5E%7Ctwcon%5Es1_&ref_url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.weatherboy.com%2Ftropical-snowstorm-drops-12-on-hawaii-island%2F&utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">pineapple powder</a>.” <img src="https://emojipedia-us.s3.dualstack.us-west-1.amazonaws.com/thumbs/120/apple/237/call-me-hand_1f919.png" width="18" style="max-width:18px" alt=""></p>

<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">

</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">

<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/tax-guide/stories/2021/02/05/magazine-writer-taxes-new-jersey-answer-knew-guy" style="text-decoration:none;border:none;" target="_blank" class="">
<img alt="Tax illustration" style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" class="story-header-image" src="https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiJ1cGxvYWRzL21lZGl1bS9hc3NldC8zNjc0L3RheF9pbGx1c3RyYXRpb24ucG5nIiwiYnVja2V0Ijoib3Nsby1wcm9kdWN0aW9uIiwiZWRpdHMiOnsicmVzaXplIjp7IndpZHRoIjoxMDAwLCJoZWlnaHQiOm51bGx9fX0=">
</a>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em>Mark Wang</em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Can confirm it can be very helpful. We called up Kaitlin Menza, a freelance writer and editor based in New York, to walk us through <a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/tax-guide/stories/2021/02/05/magazine-writer-taxes-new-jersey-answer-knew-guy?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">how she does her taxes</a> as a member of the gig economy. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">You’ll learn…1) how to stay organized when juggling many projects 2) why forming an LLC isn’t always the best option and 3) when you should call in a tax professional. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/tax-guide/stories/2021/02/05/magazine-writer-taxes-new-jersey-answer-knew-guy?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">Check out the interview</a>. </p>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</th>
</tr>
</table>

style=\"color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;\"\u003e\n\u003cfont color=\"#000000\"\u003e\nRe-Open Sesame\n\u003c/font\u003e\u003c/a\u003e\n\u003c/h1\u003e\n\u003c/td\u003e\n\u003c/tr\u003e\n\u003c/table\u003e\n\u003c!--[if mso]\u003e\n\u003cimg alt=\"A lightbulb that looks like the earth style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;\"\u003e\n\u003csmall\u003e\u003cem\u003eGiphy\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/small\u003e\n\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003ctable width=\"100%\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" border=\"0\" style=\"border-collapse: collapse;\"\u003e\n\u003ctr\u003e\n\u003ctd style=\"padding:15px\"\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eWhen the pandemic hit last winter and countries began shutting down their economies, the No. 1 question became: When will things go back to normal? \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eAn entire year has passed. Much chess was played. But armed with multiple effective vaccines, countries are starting to think about reopening offices, school systems, and retail stores...for good. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003ch2 style=\"font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0\"\u003eIsrael is furthest along\u003c/h2\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003ePowered by the fastest vaccination campaign in the world, Israel’s cabinet \u003ca href=\"https://www.nytimes.com/2021/02/18/world/middleeast/israel-covid-vaccine-reopen.html?action=click\u0026amp;module=Top%20Stories\u0026amp;pgtype=Homepage\u0026utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003evoted\u003c/a\u003e this week to open shopping malls and museums to the public. Gyms, sporting events, hotels, and swimming pools can also reopen...but only for those with a “green badge.”\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli aria-level=\"1\" style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eA green badge is a QR code that citizens can present to show they’ve been vaccinated or recovered from Covid-19. The badge gives them access to restaurants, events, and other leisure activities.\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli aria-level=\"1\" style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eThe government has stopped short of making vaccines mandatory, but hopes the green badge system incentivizes holdouts to join the 2.6+ million Israelis who have already received two doses. \u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003ch2 style=\"font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0\"\u003eThe UK wants to be next\u003c/h2\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eWith his country trailing only Israel, Seychelles, and the UAE in per capita vaccination rate, Prime Minister Boris Johnson will \u003ca href=\"https://www.reuters.com/article/us-health-coronavirus-britain/boris-johnson-charting-path-to-re-open-uk-economy-within-months-idUSKBN2AH0OH?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003elay out\u003c/a\u003e his “cautious” but “irreversible” approach on Monday to Brexit the UK out of lockdown. Early reports from news outlets point to a two-tiered reopening campaign. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli aria-level=\"1\" style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\n\u003cspan\u003e\n\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eTier 1:\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e Schools will resume on March 8 and outdoor leisure activities like parks, zoos, golf, and tennis may reopen in April. \u003c/span\u003e\n\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli aria-level=\"1\" style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\n\u003cspan\u003e\n\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eTier 2:\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e The UK’s pubs and restaurants will probably have to wait until May or early June for a full reopening.\u003c/span\u003e\n\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eReminder: \u003c/strong\u003eThe UK suffered its \u003ca href=\"https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/02/12/uk-suffers-biggest-economic-drop-300-years?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003ebiggest economic drop\u003c/a\u003e in 300+ years in 2020.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003ch2 style=\"font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0\"\u003eThe US is a little all over the place\u003c/h2\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eNYC upped indoor dining capacity to 35% starting next week and California lawmakers have proposed a $6.6 billion plan to reopen elementary schools by April. But health officials warn that some plans, especially \u003ca href=\"https://www.npr.org/2021/02/19/969467560/if-schools-follow-cdc-guidance-bidens-reopening-goals-could-be-hard-to-reach?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003ePresident Biden’s goal\u003c/a\u003e of reopening most schools by his 100th day in office, are at odds with CDC guidelines.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eBottom line: \u003c/strong\u003eUnlike when US states and many countries loosened restrictions last summer, we’re about to see what reopenings look like when a large (and increasing) chunk of the population has developed immunity from the coronavirus.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003c!-- SOCIAL LINKS --\u003e\n\u003ctable width=\"100%\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" border=\"0\" style=\"border-collapse: href=\"https://www.wsj.com/articles/single-dose-of-pfizer-vaccine-is-85-effective-israeli-study-shows-11613723218?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\"
